original_text: And forty days were fulfilled for him; for so are fulfilled the days of those which are embalmed: and the Egyptians mourned for him threescore and ten days.
korean_text: 사십 일이 걸렸으니 향으로 처리하는 데는 이 날수가 걸림이며 애굽 사람들은 칠십 일 동안 그를 위하여 곡하였더라

sentences.original_text: And forty days were fulfilled for him
for so are fulfilled the days of those which are embalmed
sentences.korean_translation: 이와 같이 미라 처리된 자들의 날들이 채워지나니

sentences.original_text: and the Egyptians mourned for him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 애굽 사람들이 그를 위해 애곡하였으니
